content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

function wrap_string(str: String, text_width: Int): String
    var lines: List[String] = []
    words := str.split(" ")
    for word in words do
        if length(lines[length(lines)-1]) + length(word) <= text_width then
            lines[length(lines)-1] = lines[length(lines)-1].." "..word
        else
            lines.append("")
        end if
    end for

    return join_on("\n", lines)
end function

Example usage:
puts wrap_string("Hello World, how are you?", 10) // Output: Hello
World, how a
re you?
